slide.title: Content Reduction: Compression
slide.blurb: The easiest way to reduce amount of sent data is by compressing it.

list.title: Advantages
list.bullet: Requires no or very little modification to the code.
Supported by majority of modern browsers.

list.title: Disadvantages
list.bullet: May increase CPU load by up to 10%
Some browsers claim to support it, but really don't.
